item.title: European markets slip as banking stocks shed over 2%; Sterling, euro slip on strong dollar
item.description: Shares of Spain's BBVA and Banco Santander were among the biggest losers in the banking stocks sell-off, falling more than 4%.

item.title: Apple offers holiday discount in China as Huawei competition heats up
item.description: Apple is facing heightened competition from a resurgent Huawei and other domestic brands.
